metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3433 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The aeson library is not safe to use to consume untrusted JSON input. A remote user could abuse this flaw to produce a hash collision in the underlying unordered-containers library by sending specially crafted JSON data, resulting in a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libghc-aeson-prof - 2.0.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: haskell-aeson package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.3.0-1').
